titles.title: As John Upon His Dear Lord's Breast (easy nice

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}As John upon His dear Lord's breast So would I lean so would I rest As empty shell In depths of sea So would I sink Be filled with Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}As singing bird in high blue air So would I soar And sing Thee there Nor rain nor stormy wind can be When all the air is full of Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And so though Daily duties crowd And dust of earth Be like a cloud Through noise of words O Lord my Rest Thy John would lean Upon Thy breast{/lang-eng}
